title: Zap Report Generation Bug

milestone.description: Enhancements and bug fixes expected to be included in a following main release.

body:
I have ZAP 2.5.0 integrated in a QA setup, where ZAP records all QA Automation test cases and then i perform an Active Scan using ZAP. I have used the JAVA API to interact with ZAP. I do get through successfully generating reports via the zapapi.core.htmlreport(). But sometimes, i get the below error.
I also save my sessions, when i opened it manually and tried to generate a html report through the report tab the same error occurs.

Error (POPUP):

File creation may have failed or is not complete.

Exception:

ERROR ReportGenerator - Character reference "&#
org.xml.sax.SAXParseException; lineNumber: 2361; columnNumber: 1222; Character reference "&#

	at com.sun.org.apache.xerces.internal.jaxp.DocumentBuilderImpl.parse(DocumentBuilderImpl.java:339)
